title: fake reports
body: i got chat restrictions even though i said nothing its cause other team got mad that i got a penta please go over my recent game

replies.body: Riot doesnt care about it, dude. Tributal Systen is closed over 2 months. They are busy sucking money from us. I wanna see when they will delete that system and delete any complaim from gamers about report system. Good luck
I'm waiting for a supreme court case vs RIOT with a free speech suit.  Hope it wins and they need to pay reparations to millions of people.
ME TO i swear at a autolocker and im the one thats getting banned for 14 days on my main
don't cry about chat restrictions man, people get permanently banned for that shit. cry when you have  a ban not a chat restriction.
Im banned on my main for 14 days.......

It's unconscionable that we are penalized without knowing what we're being penalized for and that we have no support or representation in such a system.

It's like you get accused of assault and they just show up at your house and handcuff you for the next 75 days cause people said you did it.  No due process, no trial, no defense.  People have fought wars over less.
i agree to its because im banned for 14 days on my main!
